item.title: Reading CSV File in Python
item.description: Today data is available in various formats, like, CSV, JSON, TXT etc. Python provides all the necessary tools to parse these files. In this article we will learn how to parse a large CSV file using Python. We will use Python csv package and pandas to parse the CSV file. I have taken a CSV file of baby names from here. This file contains 250K records of baby names. I am using this data to generate user database to test the login API I have built.
